item.title: Kanban
item.description: Fundamentals Visualize work Limit work-in-progress Method Start where you are Incremental, evolutionary change Respect the current process, roles, responsibilities, and titles Encourage acts of leadership at all levels Cards are nouns | Lanes are verbs Cards are things | Lanes are acivities What type of work is it? Where is it now? Where did it come from? Where will it go when I am done?
